item.title: Book discussion at Sciences Po Lyon
item.description: On April 14, Erik provided an overview of the key findings in Covering Muslims at a public presentation organized by Sciences Po Lyon and cosponsored by Fulbright France and the US Consulate in Lyon. Click on the image below to watch the recording. Erik’s presentation begins at 11:30.

item.title: Book discussion at Harvard
item.description: The Seminar on Social Exclusion and Inclusion at Harvard’s Minda de Gunzburg Center for European Studies and the Weatherhead Center for International Affairs' Research Cluster on Comparative Inequality and Inclusion hosts a panel discussion on New Research on Muslims in Europe on April 6th. The discussion will feature 3 recent books. In addition to our Covering Muslims, Elisabeth Becker-Topkara will discuss her book, Mosques in the Metropolis, and Julian Talpin and Guillaume Roux will present their L’épreuve de la discrimination.
